entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 16.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 16. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
